item.description:
Olde School Saloon and Bistro is having a fun gathering this Coming Sunday from 7 to 9!

The Cost will be $20 at the door, but for it you'll get access to an Open Bar and Exceptional Food Buffet!  Last time they ran this there was plenty of Food and the Open Bar was not limited to only certain Types!  (I.E. people got Wine, Beer, Scotch, Espresso Martini's, ect.)

The advertisements also say that there will be Live Music by "Sudden Impact" until 11 p.m.

Stacey will host this meetup, and will enter contact details in her RSVP.

This meetup is also being posted to The New Haven Area Dinning Out Group, so there should be plenty of people there.

There is limited parking in the lot next to Olde School and Street parking in the surrounding area.  If you prefer a garage, the 360 Garage is 1 block away for Credit Card Customers only.

For more info on Olde School visit: http://oldeschoolsaloonandbistro.com/Olde_School/Home.html
item.how_to_find_us: Stacey will post her Contact Details
item.name: Sunday Fun at Olde School
